content_descriptors.notes: Sonzai does not feature any explicit/adult content, but contains mature themes and imagery not suitable for young audiences. The game deals with disturbing and distressing themes, which some players may find sensitive. Mature content in game includes violence against humans, creatures, and animals, alongside non-excessive drawn depictions of blood and violence, usage of tobacco, and non-erotic scenes which include nudity and sexual themes.
